actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the family planning provisions of the Economic Opportunity Act of 1964.

summary.text: Prohibits the family planning provisions of the Economic Opportunity Act of 1964, the providing of family planning information, medical supervision or supplies to minors without the written consent of the parent. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 2836)

titles.title: A bill to amend the family planning provisions of the Economic Opportunity Act of 1964.
